name: Hyper Luminal Comp. LTD BK
details:
Hybrid Compressor The Hyper Luminal Compressor features the first hybrid design in a compressor pedal: an analog VCA controlled by a digital side-chain allowed us to capture and include the characters of some of the most legendary compressors in history while keeping the signal path completely analog. 
3 Switchable compressor models
Limited edition in black
By digitally modeling the side-chain circuits of some of the most legendary compressors, the Hyper Luminal captures their
Characteristic behavior while maintaining a fully analog signal path
Touch-through metal sensors for Ratio and Mode
Controls: Blend, Time, Level, Compression, Ratio
Switch: Mode
LED: Effect On, Ratio, Gain Reduction
Footswitch: Effect bypass
Input: 6.3 mm Jack
Output: 6.3 mm Jack
Mains adapter connection (hollow plug socket 5.5 x 2.1 mm, minus pole inside)
Current consumption: 250 mA
Power supply via 9 V DC power supply unit (not included in delivery - suitable power supply unit: Article Nr. 409939)
Dimensions (W x D x H): 42 x 111 x 64 mm
Weight: 230 g
Colour: Black
Made in Finland
